00031 #ifndef PORTALBASE_H
00032 #define PORTALBASE_H
00033 
00034 #include "OgrePCZPrerequisites.h"
00035 #include "OgrePCZSceneNode.h"
00036 #include "OgreMovableObject.h"
00037 #include "OgreAxisAlignedBox.h"
00038 #include "OgreCapsule.h"
00039 #include "OgreSphere.h"
00040 
00041 namespace Ogre
00042 {
00043     class PCZSceneNode;
00044 
00046     class _OgrePCZPluginExport PortalBase : public MovableObject
00047     {
00048     public:
00049         enum PORTAL_TYPE
00050         {
00051             PORTAL_TYPE_QUAD,
00052             PORTAL_TYPE_AABB,
00053             PORTAL_TYPE_SPHERE
00054         };
00055 
00057         PortalBase(const String& name, const PORTAL_TYPE type = PORTAL_TYPE_QUAD);
00058 
00060         virtual ~PortalBase();
00061 
00063         virtual const AxisAlignedBox& getWorldBoundingBox(bool derive = false) const;
00065         virtual const Sphere& getWorldBoundingSphere(bool derive = false) const;
00066 
00068         void setNode(SceneNode* sn);
00070         void setCurrentHomeZone(PCZone* zone);
00072         void setNewHomeZone(PCZone* zone);
00073 
00075         void setCorner(int index, const Vector3& point);
00077         void setCorners(const Vector3* corners);
00082         void setDirection(const Vector3 &d)
00083         {
00084             switch (mType)
00085             {
00086             default:
00087             case PORTAL_TYPE_QUAD:
00088                 OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00089                     "Cannot setDirection on a Quad type portal", 
00090                     "Portal::setDirection");
00091                 break;
00092             case PORTAL_TYPE_AABB:
00093             case PORTAL_TYPE_SPHERE:
00094                 if (d != Vector3::UNIT_Z &&
00095                     d != Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z)
00096                 {
00097                     OGRE_EXCEPT(Exception::ERR_INVALIDPARAMS, 
00098                         "Valid parameters are Vector3::UNIT_Z or Vector3::NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z", 
00099                         "Portal::setDirection");
00100                     return;
00101                 }
00102                 mDirection = d;
00103                 break;
00104             }
00105         }
00107         void calcDirectionAndRadius() const;
00108 
00110         PORTAL_TYPE getType() const {return mType;}
00112         Real getRadius() const;
00113 
00115         PCZone* getCurrentHomeZone()
00116         { return mCurrentHomeZone; }
00118         PCZone* getNewHomeZone()
00119         { return mNewHomeZone; }
00120 
00122         const Vector3& getCorner(int index) const
00123         { return mCorners[index]; }
00125         const Vector3& getDirection() const
00126         { return mDirection; }
00127 
00129         const Vector3& getDerivedCorner(int index) const
00130         { return mDerivedCorners[index]; }
00132         const Vector3& getDerivedDirection() const
00133         { return mDerivedDirection; }
00135         const Vector3& getDerivedCP() const
00136         { return mDerivedCP; }
00138         const Sphere& getDerivedSphere() const
00139         { return mDerivedSphere; }
00141         const Plane& getDerivedPlane() const
00142         { return mDerivedPlane; }
00143 
00145         const Vector3& getPrevDerivedCP() const
00146         { return mPrevDerivedCP; }
00148         const Plane& getPrevDerivedPlane() const
00149         { return mPrevDerivedPlane; }
00150 
00152         void updateDerivedValues() const;
00154         void adjustNodeToMatch(SceneNode* node);
00156         void setEnabled(bool value)
00157         { mEnabled = value; }
00159         bool getEnabled() const {return mEnabled;}
00160         
00161 
00162         enum PortalIntersectResult
00163         {
00164             NO_INTERSECT,
00165             INTERSECT_NO_CROSS,
00166             INTERSECT_BACK_NO_CROSS,
00167             INTERSECT_CROSS
00168         };
00170         bool intersects(const AxisAlignedBox& aab);
00171 
00173         bool intersects(const Sphere& sphere);
00174 
00176         bool intersects(const PlaneBoundedVolume& pbv);
00177 
00179         bool intersects(const Ray& ray);
00180 
00184         PortalIntersectResult intersects(PCZSceneNode* sn);
00185 
00187         bool crossedPortal(const PortalBase* otherPortal);
00189         bool closeTo(const PortalBase* otherPortal);
00190 
00192         const AxisAlignedBox& getBoundingBox() const;
00193 
00195         Real getBoundingRadius() const
00196         { return getRadius(); }
00197 
00199         void _updateRenderQueue(RenderQueue* queue)
00200         { /* Draw debug info if needed? */ }
00201 
00203         void visitRenderables(Renderable::Visitor* visitor, bool debugRenderables = false)
00204         { }
00205 
00207         void _notifyMoved()
00208         {
00209             updateDerivedValues();
00210             mWasMoved = true;
00211         }
00212 
00214         void _notifyAttached(Node* parent, bool isTagPoint = false)
00215         {
00216             MovableObject::_notifyAttached(parent, isTagPoint);
00217             mDerivedUpToDate = false;
00218         }
00219 
00221         bool needUpdate();
00222 
00224         const Capsule& getCapsule() const;
00225 
00227         const AxisAlignedBox& getAAB();
00228 
00229     protected:
00230         // Type of portal (quad, aabb, or sphere)
00231         PORTAL_TYPE mType;
00233         PCZone * mCurrentHomeZone;
00235         PCZone * mNewHomeZone;
00237         // NOTE: there are 4 corners if the portal is a quad type
00238         //       there are 2 corners if the portal is an AABB type
00239         //       there are 2 corners if the portal is a sphere type (center and point on sphere)
00240         Vector3 * mCorners;
00242         // NOTE: For a Quad portal, determined by the 1st 3 corners.
00243         // NOTE: For AABB & SPHERE portals, we only have "inward" or "outward" cases.
00244         //       To indicate "outward", the Direction is UNIT_Z
00245         //       to indicate "inward", the Direction is NEGATIVE_UNIT_Z
00246         mutable Vector3 mDirection;
00248         // NOTE: For aabb portals, this value is the distance from the center of the aab to a corner
00249         mutable Real mRadius;
00250         // Local Centerpoint of the portal
00251         mutable Vector3 mLocalCP;
00253         // NOTE: there are 4 corners if the portal is a quad type
00254         //       there are 2 corners if the portal is an AABB type (min corner & max corner)
00255         //       there are 2 corners if the portal is a sphere type (center and point on sphere)
00256         Vector3 * mDerivedCorners;
00258         // NOTE: Only applicable for a Quad portal
00259         mutable Vector3 mDerivedDirection;
00261         mutable Vector3 mDerivedCP;
00263         mutable Sphere mDerivedSphere;
00265         // NOTE: Only applicable for a Quad portal
00266         mutable Plane mDerivedPlane;
00268         mutable Vector3 mPrevDerivedCP;
00270         // NOTE: Only applicable for a Quad portal
00271         mutable Plane mPrevDerivedPlane;
00273         mutable bool mLocalsUpToDate;
00275         mutable bool mDerivedUpToDate;
00276         // previous world transform
00277         mutable Matrix4 mPrevWorldTransform;
00278         // flag defining if portal is enabled or disabled.
00279         bool mEnabled;
00280         // cache of portal's capsule.
00281         mutable Capsule mPortalCapsule;
00282         // cache of portal's AAB that contains the bound of portal movement.
00283         mutable AxisAlignedBox mPortalAAB;
00284         // cache of portal's previous AAB.
00285         mutable AxisAlignedBox mPrevPortalAAB;
00286         // cache of portal's local AAB.
00287         mutable AxisAlignedBox mLocalPortalAAB;
00288         // defined if portal was moved previously.
00289         mutable bool mWasMoved;
00290     };
00291

00294     {
00295     protected:
00297         PortalBase::PORTAL_TYPE getPortalType(const NameValuePairList* params);
00298 
00299     };

00301 }
